productEmsList.title: Model
productEmsList.tooltip:
vívomove Sport: 40 mm case size
vívomove Style: 42 mm case size, aluminium case and colour AMOLED display that fills the dial
vivomove Luxe: 42 mm case size, stainless steel case and colour AMOLED display that fills the dial
vívomove Trend: 40 mm case size and stainless steel bezel

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: vivomove® 3S is a smaller-sized hybrid smartwatch with all-day fitness and health monitoring features, hidden touchscreen display and much more.
seoAttributes.seoKeywords: hybrid smartwatch, fashion watch, fitness watch, Garmin vivomove 3S, vivomove
seoAttributes.title: vívomove® 3S

seo.ogDescription: vivomove® 3S is a smaller-sized hybrid smartwatch with all-day fitness and health monitoring features, hidden touchscreen display and much more.
seo.title: Garmin vivomove® 3S | Smaller-Sized Hybrid Smartwatch

specs.Battery life:
Smartwatch mode: up to 5 days
Watch mode: up to 1 additional week
specs.Gym: Strength, Cardio and Elliptical Training, Stair Stepping
specs.Memory/History: 10 timed activities; 14 days of activity tracking data
specs.Physical size:
39 x 39 x 10.9 mm

Fits wrists with a circumference of 110-175 mm
specs.Weight:
Case only: 24.5 g
With silicone strap: 38.6 g

overviewTab.title: Overview

specsTab.content:
What You'll Love
Battery life (smartwatch mode)Up to 5 days
Pulse Ox blood oxygen saturation Yes (spot-check and optionally in sleep)
Watch display typeAMOLED
Touchscreen
Water rating Swim, 5 ATM

General
Strap material

silicone

Lens Material

chemically strengthened glass

Bezel Material

stainless steel

Case materialfiber-reinforced polymer
Quick Release bandsYes (18 mm, Industry standard)
Physical size

39 x 39 x 10.9 mm

Fits wrists with a circumference of 110-175 mm

Weight

Case only: 24.5 g
With silicone strap: 38.6 g

Display Size0.35" x 0.72" (8.9 mm x 18.3 mm)
Display Resolution64 x 132 pixels
Battery lifeSmartwatch mode: up to 5 days
Watch mode: up to 1 additional week
Charging methodGarmin proprietary plug charger
Memory/History10 timed activities; 14 days of activity tracking data

Clock Features
Time/date
Automatic daylight saving time
Alarm clock
Timer
Stopwatch
Analog hands

Health & Wellness Monitoring
Wrist-based heart rate (constant, every second)
Daily resting heart rate
Abnormal heart rate alertsYes (high and low)
Respiration Rate (24x7)
FITNESS AGE Yes (in app)
BODY BATTERY™ ENERGY MONITOR
All-day stress
Relaxation reminders
Relaxation Breathing Timer
Breathwork
SLEEP Yes (Advanced)
Hydration
Women's Health

Sensors
Garmin Elevate™ wrist heart rate monitor
Pulse Ox Blood Oxygen Saturation Monitor
Barometric altimeter
Accelerometer
Ambient light sensor

Daily Smart Features
ConnectivityBluetooth® Smart and ANT+®
Smart Notifications
Text response/reject phone call with text (Android™ only)
Connected GPS
Calendar
Weather forecasts
Controls smartphone music
Find My Phone
Find My Watch
Pairs with Garmin Connect™ Mobile
Smartphone compatibilityiPhone®, Android™

Activity profiles
GymStrength, Cardio and Elliptical Training, Stair Stepping
WELLNESSWalking, Pilates, Yoga
INDOOR RUNNINGTreadmill Running
OUTDOOR RUNNINGRunning
CyclingBiking
SwimPool Swimming

Safety and Tracking Features
Incident Detection during select activities
Incident detection alert on phone for wearables
Assistance
LiveTrack

Activity Tracking Features
Step counter
Move alerts (displays on device after a period of inactivity; walk for a couple of minutes to reset it)
Auto goal (learns your activity level and assigns a daily step goal)
Calories Burned
Floors climbed
Distance traveled
Intensity minutes
TrueUp™
Move IQ™

Gym & Fitness Equipment
Automatic rep counting

Training, Planning and Analysis Features
Customisable screen(s)
HR zones
HR alerts
HR calories
% HR max
HR broadcast (broadcasts HR data over ANT+™ to paired devices)
Respiration rate (during exercise) Yoga and Breathwork only
GPS speed and distanceyes (Connected GPS only)
Customizable activity profiles
Auto Lap®
VO2 Max (Run)
Physio TrueUp

Running Features
GPS-based distance, time and pace

Cycling Features
Alerts (triggers alarm when you reach goals including time, distance, heart rate or calories)

Swimming Features
Underwater wrist-based heart rate

Kid Activity Tracking Features
Toe-to-Toe™ Challenges app
